abstract_summ: Descriptive statistics were used to analyze the demographic profile of the confirmed cases.Of the 3,018 confirmed cases, majority were male, elderly, and diagnosed in Metro Manila region.CONCLUSION: The first 100 cases of COVID-19 in Taiwan showed the persistent threat of imported cases from different countries.Since the last of March, COVID-19 cases soared up in Tokyo (β = 103.51) and Osaka (β = 28.07).We report the epidemiological, demographic, and clinical findings for confirmed COVID-19 cases during the first month of the epidemic in Brazil.
title_summ: Implications for surveillance, control, and travel restrictionsEpidemiological characteristics of novel coronavirus infection: A statistical analysis of publicly available case dataForecasting the Peak of Novel Coronavirus Disease in Egypt Using Current Confirmed Cases and DeathsCoronavirus infections reported by ProMED, February 2000–January 2020Analysis of Imported Cases of COVID-19 in Taiwan: A Nationwide StudyEpidemiological Analysis of the First 1389 Cases of COVID-19 in Poland: A Preliminary ReportEarly Transmission Dynamics of Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) in NigeriaEpidemiology of COVID-19 in Mexico: From the 27th of February to the 30th of April 2020()Data Analysis of Coronavirus CoVID‐19 Epidemic in South Korea Based on Recovered and Death CasesDengue Fever and Severe Dengue in Barbados, 2008–2016Epidemiological analysis of the Kaohsiung city strategy for dengue fever quarantine and epidemic preventionEpidemiology of the first 100 cases of COVID-19 in Taiwan and its implications on outbreak controlDynamics of COVID-19 outbreak in Poland: an epidemiological analysis of the first two months of the epidemic.Trends in COVID-19 outbreak in Tokyo and Osaka from January 25 to May 06, 2020: a joinpoint regression analysis of the outbreak data.The First Wave and Future ScenarioEpidemiological characteristics of an outbreak of Coronavirus Disease 2019 in the PhilippinesEpidemiological investigation of the first 135 COVID-19 cases in Brunei:Epidemiological and clinical characteristics of the early phase of the COVID-19 epidemic in BrazilNovel coronavirus (COVID-19) Outbreak in Iraq:
title_abstract_phrases: Forecasting the Peak of Novel Coronavirus Disease in Egypt Using Current Confirmed Cases and DeathsThe first case of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) in Egypt was reported on 14 February 2020 and the number of reported cases has increased daily.Descriptive statistics were used to analyze the demographic profile of the confirmed cases.Of the 3,018 confirmed cases, majority were male, elderly, and diagnosed in Metro Manila region.Since the last of March, COVID-19 cases soared up in Tokyo (β = 103.51) and Osaka (β = 28.07).We report the epidemiological, demographic, and clinical findings for confirmed COVID-19 cases during the first month of the epidemic in Brazil.
